verbs.description: pizza from scratch you [V: can] make this tasty pizza yourself with hardly any fuss my sister shared the recipe with me years ago it now a staple in our home have everyone pitch in when assembling the pizza it a nice way to get the family together —audra dee collins hobbs new mexico
